text: The Americanization of Emily is a 1964 American World War II romantic drama movie directed by Arthur Hiller and was based on the novel of the same name by William Bradford Huie. It stars James Garner, Julie Andrews, James Coburn, Paul Newlan, Joyce Grenfell, Keenwan Wynn, Liz Frazer, Edward Binns and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1965. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 romantic drama movies Category:1964 war movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Arthur Hiller Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: The Americanization of Emily
